overview: AljoÅ¡a has ten years of experience as an entrepreneur, executive and media specialist. As a founding partner Aljosa supervised nine companies in the fields of interactive services, software, interactive advertising and online media. He was responsible for investment decisions, strategic, legal, financial and corporate issues, international expansions and partnerships. Aljosa co-founded and lead Httpool, a leading online media network in Eastern Europe, where he developed five local markets and established pan-European presence through exclusive partnerships with major European online advertising networks. Prior to that, Aljosa co-founded, managed and sold 00net, the largest national indoor media network in Slovenia.
